name: unruled
content:
unruled adjective
(PAPER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unruled paper does not have any lines across it: The book consists of large, white, unruled pages. He used unruled exercise books as his notebooks. Synonym
unlined (PAPER)Opposite
lined (PAPER)
More examplesFewer examplesThe last three pages were hastily written on unruled paper.A single unruled sheet appears at the beginning and end.The last page is unruled and was originally left blank. Since notepaper was blank, or unruled, making a table required a steady hand, a straight edge, and the ability to divide the page into equal columns and rows.

unruled adjective
(NOT GOVERNED )
not governed or controlled: For many years they remained unruled. Related word
rule verb (CONTROL)
